name: Palazzo Pisani B&B
description: Situated in Żabbar, Palazzo Pisani Malta B&B features a restaurant, pool views and free WiFi, 2.7 km from Rinella Bay Beach and 3.2 km from Hal Saflieni Hypogeum. The bed and breakfast offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and shower. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Palazzo Pisani Malta B&B. The accommodation offers a year-round outdoor pool. A an indoor play area is also available at Palazzo Pisani Malta B&B, while guests can also relax on the sun terrace. Valletta Waterfront is 8.2 km from the bed and breakfast, while Upper Barrakka Gardens is 8.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Malta International, 6 km from Palazzo Pisani Malta B&B, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Gillieru Harbour Hotel
address: Church Square, Saint Paul’s Bay SPB 2820
description: The Gillieru Harbour Hotel is on the seafront in St. Paul’s Bay. It offers free Wi-Fi, a pool, and air-conditioned rooms with balcony, TV and private bathroom. Some rooms at the Gillieru Hotel include views of the fishing harbour of St. Paul’s Bay. The restaurant at the Gillieru specialises in fish, and serves both local dishes and international cuisine. Hotel Gillieru Harbour is a 5-minute walk from the shops, restaurants and bars of Bugibba. The casino is 10 minutes away on foot.

name: Seaview Hotel - Adults Only 16 Plus
description: With panoramic views of St. Paul's Islands, this modern hotel offers two swimming pools, a sun terrace, a gym, a rooftop bar and a restaurant. The property is located within a 5-minute walk of Bugibba Perched Beach and offers convenient access to the other rocky and sandy beaches in the area. With air conditioning and free WiFi, rooms at the Sea View feature a furnished balcony. They all come with tea/coffee making facilities, a minibar, a safe and a satellite TV. The en-suite bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available daily and includes cooked dishes. The restaurant serves both Maltese and English specialities. Diving, fishing and horse riding excursions can be booked at reception. Boats to the nearby islands leave from Plajja Tal'Bognor, a few minutes' walk away. The property is a 5-minute walk from Bugibba centre. Shops, restaurants and clubs are within 500 metres of the Seaview Hotel - Adults Only 16 Plus.

name: Bora Bora Ibiza Malta Resort - Music Hotel - Adults Only 18 plus
address: 1, Triq Censu Tanti, Saint Paul’s Bay SPB 3010
description: Bora Bora Ibiza Malta Resort - Music Hotel - Adults Only 18 plus features a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in St Paul's Bay. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, indoor pool, nightclub and room service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. The units feature a wardrobe. A continental breakfast is available every morning at Bora Bora Ibiza Malta Resort - Music Hotel - Adults Only 18 plus. The accommodation offers a hot tub. Popular points of interest near Bora Bora Ibiza Malta Resort - Music Hotel - Adults Only 18 plus include Bugibba Perched Beach, Tax-Xama Bay Beach and Malta National Aquarium. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

name: The Village Boutique & Spa
description: Located in Naxxar and with University of Malta reachable within 4.9 km, The Village Boutique and SPA provides express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. Providing a bar, the property is located within 5.2 km of Bay Street Shopping Complex. The property features a seasonal outdoor pool, indoor pool, fitness centre and garden. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms come with a kettle, while selected rooms come with a balcony and others also offer city views. At The Village Boutique and SPA each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Chinese, Indian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Portomaso Marina is 5.5 km from The Village Boutique and SPA, while Love Monument is 5.7 km away. The nearest airport is Malta International, 9 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Be.Hotel
address: 3311 St. George's Bay, St. Julians, St. Julian's STJ 3315
description: Just 200 metres from the sandy beach of St George’s Bay, the 4-star be.HOTEL is located within the Baystreet Tourist Complex. It boasts a large panoramic pool on its 11th-floor rooftop terrace. In this modern and colourful hotel, you can book a massage at the nearby beauty salon. Set in 2 wings, air-conditioned rooms come with an interactive HD TV and en suite bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. All rooms have free WiFi. Inside the complex you will find a huge number of shops, a family entertainment centre, a bowling alley and a large range of restaurants. Pubs, bars and clubs are all located close by be.HOTEL, allowing you to make the most of Paceville's lively nightlife. Malta International Airport is 9 km away.

name: Canifor Hotel
address: Triq In Nakkri, Saint Paul’s Bay SPB 05
description: Near the centre of Bugibba and public transport, the Canifor Hotel is located in a quiet position, just 150 metres from Qawra's seaside promenade and rocky beaches. At the Canifor Hotel you will find indoor and outdoor swimming pools, a sun terrace and a hot tub. Relax in the lounge bar. Canifor Hotel provides a 24-hour reception, a cafeteria and an on-site restaurant.

name: The Preluna Hotel
description: Set on Sliema’s seafront, Malta’s The Preluna Hotel features 4 restaurants, a free gym, and a private beach. The spacious rooms have modern décor, and some units offer views of the Mediterranean Sea. All rooms at the Preluna are air-conditioned and feature a tea/coffee maker, satellite flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with bath and shower. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The private beach area features a large swimming pool, a kids' pool, and a bar and grill. The Feelgood spa includes an indoor heated pool with hydromassage and a sauna. Massages and treatments can also be reserved. The restaurants are open for lunch and dinner. The Triton, the main restaurant with Mediterranean Sea views, is buffet style with international dishes and an open show kitchen. Breakfast is a generous hot and cold buffet. At the Skyroom Cocktail Bar & Grill guests can enjoy a drink or head to the sea-view open terrace for dinner.

name: Solana Hotel & Spa
address: Gorg Borg Olivier Street, Mellieha MLH 1025
description: Solana Hotel offers modern rooms and studios with free Wi-Fi access, a 10-minute walk from the beach on Mellieha Bay. The rooftop terrace with pool is a real highlight. In your room or studio you will find satellite TV, air conditioning, and a tea and coffee maker. Studios come with a small kitchenette. Hotel Solana features an indoor pool with hydromassage corner, gym and a children's play room. You can enjoy a mix of local and international cuisine, plus a selection of fine wines. There is a range of restaurants and snack bars. Live entertainment takes place in the evening.

name: The Windsor Hotel
address: Windsor Terrace WG82Crp Tas-Sliema, Sliema SLM10
description: With a stay at The Windsor Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Sliema, steps from Tower Road and 5 minutes by foot from Sliema Promenade. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: AX The Palace
description: Offering a rooftop terrace, an infinity pool and a swimming pool, The Palace - AX Hotels is a luxurious base in Sliema. It also offers 24-hour room service, a sauna and body treatments. This modern hotel provides massage services, fitness classes and meeting rooms. For trendy travellers a bar provides a happy setting for an evening drink. After a day of sightseeing in the area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They are all soundproofed and include slippers, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom. Guests of The Palace - AX Hotels are invited to sample international, European and Mediterranean cuisine at Tabloid, or try fusion, Indian and Asian meals at TemptAsian. In the evening, those staying at the property are welcome to enjoy a drink in the on-site bar. A wide choice of dining options are also found in the area. The hotel makes an ideal place to discover St Julians and Gzira and is a short stroll from Sliema Ferries. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Sliema.Revato

name: Diplomat Hotel
description: The Diplomat Hotel is set on Tower Road, prestigious seaside promenade in the heart of the popular town of Sliema. There is a rooftop swimming pool, and bus links to Valletta and St. Julian’s outside the hotel. Rooms at the Diplomat come with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV, air conditioning and tea/coffee making facilities. Rooms offer full or lateral sea views. In front of The Diplomat Hotel, a pleasant rocky beach is ideal for bathing, swimming, and practising water sports. The sandy beach of St. George's Bay is less than 3 km away. Shops, the Dragonara Casino and a cinema complex are all available nearby. The promenade has numerous restaurants serving local and international specialities.

name: La Falconeria Hotel
description: Offering a fitness centre and a bar, La Falconeria Hotel is set in Valletta. WiFi is free throughout. Each elegantly decorated room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have views of the city. Rooms include a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. You can start the day with an à la carte breakfast, which provides a selection of sweet and savoury products, served hot and cold, as well as fresh fruit, hot drinks, and fruit juice. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also offers car hire. Upper Barrakka Gardens is 300 metres from La Falconeria Hotel, while National Museum of Archaeology is 100 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 5 km from the property.

name: Hyatt Regency Malta
address: St George's Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3310
description: Conveniently set in the centre of St Julian's, Hyatt Regency Malta provides air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a garden, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. A terrace, an on-site bar and shared lounge are available. At the hotel, each room has a desk. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, certain rooms at Hyatt Regency Malta also offer a city view. Guest rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Hyatt Regency Malta offers 5-star accommodation with a spa centre. Staff speak Arabic, German, English and Spanish at the reception. Popular points of interest near the hotel include St George's Bay Beach, Balluta Bay Beach and Bay Street Shopping Complex. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 9 km from Hyatt Regency Malta.

name: Hotel Santana
address: Triq Il Maskli, Qawra, Spb 1482, Malta, Qawra
description: Hotel Santana offers panoramic views and a rooftop pool overlooking the sea and the countryside of St. Paul's Bay. The seaside promenade is 150 metres away. All rooms at the Santana have a TV, air conditioning, and a private bathroom. Most rooms feature a balcony. WiFi is free throughout the property. The property's garden features an outdoor bar, you can relax and unwind while enjoying live entertainment. The Santana Hotel has an indoor swimming pool with hydromassage features, plus a sauna and a fitness room. Beauty treatments are also available here. The property is complete with a restaurant, a café, and a rooftop pool bar with panoramic sea views. Free public parking is located across the street from the Santana Hotel. Public bus stops connecting Qawra to all Malta destinations are nearby. The seaside promenade, and a variety of shops, bars and restaurants are all a short walk away. A sandy beach and a further, rocky beach are also less than a 5-minute walk. The Malta National Aquarium is 600 metres away.

name: Mayflower Hotel Malta
address: Triq l-Imhar Qawra, Saint Paul’s Bay SPB 1772
description: Boasting a sun terrace with a swimming pool, a restaurant, a fitness centre and free WiFi throughout, Mayflower Hotel is set in St Paul's Bay, 700 metres from Malta National Aquarium and a 5-minute walk from Bugibba Perched Beach. All air conditioned, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a kettle and a private bathroom. Some units also feature a balcony. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed daily at the property. Speaking German and English, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the 24-hour front desk. Malta International Airport is 18 km from Mayflower Hotel.

name: 1926 Le Soleil Hotel & Spa
description: Located in Sliema, 200 metres from MedAsia Beach, 1926 Le Soleil Hotel & Spa provides accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. A spa and wellness centre comprising a fitness centre, an outdoor swimming pool, a sauna, as well as a terrace can be used by all guests. Selected rooms have a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a stovetop. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Qui-Si-Sana Beach is 400 metres from 1926 Le Soleil Hotel & Spa, while Fond Ghadir Beach is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Pergola Hotel & Spa
description: The Pergola Hotel & Spa is a 4-Star hotel located in a beautiful residential area, overlooking the quaint village of Mellieha, the popular bay and the sister islands of Gozo and Comino. The hotel is situated just a few metres away from shops, restaurants, bars, banks and only 10 minutes or 1km away from the largest sandy beach on the island; Mellieha Bay. The Pergola offers a range of accommodation from deluxe self-catering apartments to hotel rooms. Some of the apartments enjoy what many consider to be Malta’s best postcard view! The hotel offers free Wi-fi for all to keep connected! Pergola is popular with families and couples who want a break from the hustle and bustle of everyday stress, but yet want to be within easy proximity to the amenities. Buses to Malta’s main tourist attractions including Valletta, Mdina, Blue Grotto, Sliema and St. Julian’s, pass through the village very frequently. The Pergola enjoys ample panoramic sun-terraces, 2 outdoor pools with children’s paddling pools, 2 conference rooms, fitness centre and Jacuzzi. Da Vinci Spa provides an extensive range of health, beauty and well-being treatments at reasonable prices. The bars and restaurants within Pergola all offer variety and promise a different experience and a window into the Mediterranean cuisine. The Cave Bar (seasonal) is the hotel’s signature outlet; a bar into the natural rock that has been not only serving drinks, cocktails and a vast range of snacks but also showing live sports and events from across the globe. Da Ciccio Cucina is the latest addition and has become popular with those loving Italian cuisine whilst the Bonaventura and Al Fresco (seasonal) remain favourites for those preferring the differently daily themed buffets. The PADI dive-centre within the hotel is an another facility that literally gives you access into another world!Official Hotel Information

name: Inhawi Boutique Hostel
address: Triq Telghet San Giljan, St. Julian's
description: Located 300 metres from the seafront of St. Julian's and a 10-minute walk from Sliema, Inhawi Boutique Hostel boasts an outdoor pool and sea views. The hostel offers accommodation in dormitory rooms. Some units feature a terrace or a balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. A continental-style breakfast is offered daily, including both sweet and savoury items, fresh fruit and hot drinks. The hostel also offers bike hire. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 6 km from Inhawi Boutique Hostel.

name: Azur Hotel By St Hotels
description: Located in Il-Gżira, 1.3 km from Rock Beach, Azur Hotel by ST Hotels provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, an ATM and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel each room is fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Azur Hotel by ST Hotels offers certain rooms with city views, and rooms come with a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at Azur Hotel by ST Hotels. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Balluta Bay Beach, Qui-Si-Sana Beach and Love Monument. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 8 km from Azur Hotel by ST Hotels.

name: Grands Suites Hotel Residences and Spa
description: Set in Il-Gżira, Grands Suites Hotel Residences and Spa features 4-star accommodation with private balconies. Ideally set in the Ta' Giorni district, this hotel offers a bar, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The property has a seasonal outdoor pool, indoor pool, fitness centre and restaurant. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Grands Suites Hotel Residences and Spa provides some units with city views, and rooms have a patio. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, continental and Full English/Irish options. Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish, Italian and Maltese. Popular points of interest near Grands Suites Hotel Residences and Spa include Rock Beach, Balluta Bay Beach and Qui-Si-Sana Beach. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

name: Lemon Tree Relais by CX Collection
description: Located in Żabbar and with Hal Saflieni Hypogeum reachable within 3.7 km, Lemon Tree Relais by CX Collection provides express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. Featuring luggage storage space, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation features a concierge service and a housekeeping service for guests. The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. At Lemon Tree Relais by CX Collection every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, Italian or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property. Valletta Waterfront is 8.8 km from the accommodation, while Upper Barrakka Gardens is 9.4 km away. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 6 km from Lemon Tree Relais by CX Collection.

name: 115 The Strand Hotel and Suites by Neu Collective
description: 115 The Strand Hotel and Suites offers self-catering apartments and hotel rooms on the Sliema waterfront at Marsamxett harbour, with spectacular views of Valletta. WiFi is free throughout. A regular bus service to Valletta and other landmarks stops just outside the 115 The Strand Hotel and Suites. The ferry stop is also nearby. The hotel has an Executive Lounge on the 9th Floor with a restaurant and bar which has a panoramic view. On the roof terrace you will also find a tanning area and whirlpool. The property has a café and souvenir shop on site.

name: Hotel Primera
address: Pioneer Road, Bugibba Spb04, Saint Pauls Bay, Bugibba, Bugibba SPB04
description: Primera Hotel is 200 metres from the sandy beach in the heart of Bugibba, a 5-minute walk from Bugibba Bus Station. Its rooftop terrace features a small, swimming pool, bar and Mediterranean Sea views. It also has an indoor pool. Rooms are all air conditioned and come with a TV. A fridge and kettle are available on request. The restaurant offers a varied menu, with only local seasonal ingredients used to prepare your meal. Hotel Primera is surrounded by the town's most popular shops, bars and restaurants. Malta International Airport is only a 30-minute drive away.

name: db San Antonio Hotel & Spa
address: Triq it-Turisti, Saint Paul’s Bay SPB 1024
description: San Antonio Hotel & Spa overlooks St. Paul’s Bay in Malta. It offers indoor and outdoor swimming pools, and a Moroccan-style spa complete with hot tub, a steam bath and a fitness centre. Modern rooms of the San Antonio Hotel & Spa are air conditioned, and offer a balcony and a 32" LCD satellite TV.Free WiFi is available throughout. Massages and treatments at the beauty salon are available at an additional cost at the db San Antonio Hotel & Spa. Guests can enjoy discounts at the nearest private sandy beach, just 150 metres away. Start your day with a rich and varied breakfast buffet. For lunch and dinner you have a choice of cuisine in a variety of restaurants and cafés. San Antonio Hotel & Spa has a fun selection of multilingual entertainment the whole year round. A local bus service stops just 100 metres away and connects you to the rest of Malta.

name: Hotel Juliani
address: 25, St George's Road, St. Julian's STJ 3208
description: Offering a rooftop terrace and pool, Hotel Juliani - Boutique Hotel has panoramic views across Spinola Bay. Set in an elegant town house on Saint Julian's seafront, it offers free Wi-Fi and free parking. Spacious, air-conditioned rooms at this boutique hotel include a minibar and a TV with satellite channels. Each private bathroom has soft bathrobes plus Walk-In Shower and Rain Showers, hairdryer and free toiletries. The on-site Zest restaurant specialises in European and Asian cooking, and includes a terrace bar. A continental buffet breakfast is served in the Juliani Cafe, which also offers light meals and snacks throughout the day. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the beach at Balluta Bay. Spinola bus stop is right outside with great connections around Malta.

name: Mercure St. Julian´s Malta
description: Mercure Hotel St. Julian's is located in one of Malta's prettiest towns. The Hotel is only a short walking distance from Malta's top 3 casinos, conference centres, fine bars, restaurants, clubs and diving centres. The Hotel welcomes it's guests with it's stylish and contemporary interior whilst also offering a local meditteranean charm. The Hotel enjoys views of Spinola Bay together with a rooftop pool, gym, and stylish rooms all of which have free WIFI, smart TVS, tea and coffee making facilitiesaccorhotels.com

name: ibis Styles ST Pauls Bay Malta
address: Halel Street Bugibba, Saint Paul’s Bay SPB 2528
description: Set down your bags, breath, take your time, relax, and unwind at ibis Styles St. Paul's Bay Malta. Inspired by the charm of the Mediterranean landscape and its distinctive prickly pears, this stylish hotel welcomes you in the heart of Bugibba with 65 trendy rooms featuring king size bed s, 43 inch TV, free WIFI, tea and coffee facilities for the cosiest comfort. Enjoy stunning view of the Bay from the rooftop pool, recharge in the fitness room and enjoy our freshly baked savours at our lounge baraccorhotels.com

name: Paradise Bay Resort
description: Featuring 3 outdoor pools, and spacious, sunbathing terraces, Paradise Bay Resort overlooks Paradise Bay on one side and the islands of Gozo and Comino on the other. Free WiFi and private parking are available on site. The hotel features sea-view rooms with satellite TV, mini fridge, and tea/coffee making facilities. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. A generous buffet-style continental breakfast is provided daily. Guests can also enjoy a meal at one of the 3 on-site restaurants. Lunch and dinner is in the form of a rich, Mediterranean buffet, with an à la carte menu also available. Paradise Hotel's private beach can be enjoyed during the summer. Water sports and scuba-diving courses with qualified instructors are available all year round. The heated indoor pool is open during cooler months. On requests, relaxing moments can be savoured in the hot tub and sauna, and discounts are available for on-site massages. A tennis court and a playground for children are also featured at the property. The hotel has a dedicated team of multi-lingual staff who are always happy to be of assistance. The Paradise Bay also has 4 meeting rooms, suitable for a maximum of 180 delegates. A nearby bus will offer you connections to Valletta and Malta International Airport, both within 30 km of the property. The hotel is also within walking distance of the Ferry Terminal to Gozo island. Mellieha beach is 3.5 km away.

name: Hotel Argento
description: With a stunning rooftop terrace with swimming pool, Hotel Argento is located in the tranquil residential area of Spinola Bay, just behind St Julian's Terminus. Wi-Fi is free. Rooms at Hotel Argento are air conditioned, and feature a flat-screen TV, minibar and tea and coffee-making facilities. Some have a balcony and some come with floor-to-ceiling windows. This 4-star hotel boasts a contemporary design and modern amenities. There is also a bar and a 24-hour reception. A buffet-style continental breakfast is available daily. The neighbourhood is full of restaurants, shops and cafés, with the nightlife of the Paceville district just a few steps away. The hotel enjoys great bus links around Malta, including Malta International Airport and the capital city of Valletta, both 20 minutes' drive away.

name: Cornucopia Hotel
description: Offering a large garden with outdoor pool and hot tub, Cornucopia Hotel is located in Xagħra, on the island of Gozo, Malta. Parking and Wi-Fi access in public areas are free. Decorated with antique wood furniture, each room is air conditioned and features a living area with an LCD TV. Some rooms have a balcony, other have a patio. At the restaurant you can taste local specialities and traditional Maltese cuisine. Breakfast is served every morning continental style. Hotel Cornucopia is a 10-minute drive from the pier for ferries to Malta. Victoria, the capital of Gozo, can be reached by car in 5 minutes.

name: Plaza Regency Hotels
description: Plaza Regency Hotels is set right on the seafront in Sliema with beautiful views across St. Julian's Bay and Balluta Bay. It features a rooftop swimming pool and sun terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The Plaza Regency comprises 2 different hotels connected by a bridge on the 6th floor. All rooms are air conditioned but have different styles, from classic to modern. Most offer a partial or full sea view. Featuring 2 bars, a pizzeria and restaurant, the hotels offer food and drink all day. The rooftop is used for evening entertainment. With 2 swimming pools, the Plaza Regency lies close to the beach and right next to a bus stop. It is easy to reach Valletta and Malta International Airport.

name: The Xara Palace Relais & Chateaux
description: The Xara Palace Boutique Hotel is a unique 17th-century palace hidden away in the medieval fortified city of Mdina, the old capital of Malta. Perched on centuries-old bastions, surrounded by stunning baroque architecture, The Xara Palace Relais & Châteaux, with its luxurious accommodation and award-winning haute cuisine, is truly a haven in which to pause and be pampered. Meticulously and sensitively restored to reflect its former noble standing, the exclusive 5-Star boutique hotel boasts seventeen luxury rooms and suites enjoying stunning views, all individually and tastefully designed with antique furniture and paintings, luxurious Parisian fabrics and king size beds. Our promise to our guests centres on an impeccable attention to detail – from the décor to the serene, unhurried pace of life at The Xara Palace Hotel, through every facet of our service – all setting the scene for nothing less than an exquisitely unforgettable holiday in Malta.

name: Land's End Boutique Hotel
description: Set 600 metres from Tigné Point Beach, Land's End, Boutique Hotel offers 4-star accommodation in Sliema and features a terrace, a restaurant and a bar. The property is situated 2.6 km from Love Monument, 3 km from Portomaso Marina and 3.5 km from Bay Street Shopping Complex. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The units at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Every room has a coffee machine, while certain rooms here will provide you with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. At Land's End, Boutique Hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels. A buffet, Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna. Popular points of interest near Land's End, Boutique Hotel include MedAsia Beach, Qui-Si-Sana Beach and Exiles Beach. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 8 km from the hotel.

name: Mulberries
address: The Mulberries Trejqet Il-wied Ta Mazza, Kalkara ZBR 3852
description: Located in Żabbar, 4 km from Hal Saflieni Hypogeum, Mulberries provides accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Providing a bar, the property is located within 9 km of Valletta Waterfront. The hotel also features free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at Mulberries have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms include a balcony. At the accommodation each room comes with bed linen and towels. Mulberries offers a continental or Italian breakfast. You can play billiards and darts at the hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and golfing. Upper Barrakka Gardens is 10 km from Mulberries, while University of Malta - Valletta Campus is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Ax Odycy Hotel
address: Qawra Coast Road, Saint Paul’s Bay
description: Located in Qawra, Seashells Resort - AX Hotels offers cosy 4-star accommodation, as well as a sauna, a Turkish steam bath and a saltwater swimming pool. It also provides squash courts, body treatments and water slides. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar and a telephone. The resort also has several connecting rooms to accommodate families. Those staying at Seashells Resort - AX Hotels can dine on local cuisines at the in-house restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close by for a meal. Each evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. Seashells Resort - AX Hotels is a convenient place to discover nearby Bugibba and St Pauls Bay, which are within a 10-minute drive. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Qawra.Revato

name: Kempinski Hotel San Lawrenz
description: Kempinski San Lawrenz Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Gozo. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, fax machine, photocopying, wheelchair accessible are there for guest's enjoyment. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless, internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Kempinski San Lawrenz Hotel.priceline.com

name: Hotel Kennedy Nova
description: Set in a prime location of Sliema, Hotel Kennedy Nova puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. All the necessary facilities, including daily housekeeping, taxi service, ticket service, wheelchair accessible, 24-hour front desk, are at hand. Television LCD/plasma screen, linens, towels, air conditioning, heating can be found in selected guestrooms. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, pool (kids). Convenience and comfort makes Hotel Kennedy Nova the perfect choice for your stay in Sliema.priceline.com

name: Cerviola Hotel
description: Located in Marsaskala, Cerviola Hotel features a seasonal rooftop pool, a sun terrace and a bar. There is a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi is available throughout. All air conditioned, rooms at the Cerviola come with a desk, a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. A fridge and a coffee machine are also at guests' disposal in each room. The private bathroom is fitted with a walk-in shower and equipped with free toiletries and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the hotel. Valletta is 13 km from Cerviola Hotel, while St Julian's is 15 km away. Malta International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Urban Rooms By Neu Collective
description: Set in Il-Gżira, 1.3 km from Qui-Si-Sana Beach, Urban Rooms by NEU Collective features views of the city. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property features a year-round outdoor pool, sauna, hot tub and terrace. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Urban Rooms by NEU Collective all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or Full English/Irish breakfast. A business centre and a car rental service are also offered by Urban Rooms by NEU Collective. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Rock Beach, Balluta Bay Beach and Love Monument. The nearest airport is Malta International, 8 km from Urban Rooms by NEU Collective, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Qawra Palace Resort & Spa
address: Qawra Coast Road, Saint Paul’s Bay
description: Overlooking Salina Bay, QAWRA Palace Resort & SPA has its own indoor and outdoor swimming pools. It also features a mini golf course and a games room with pool table. Each room features a private balcony with views of the bay or the internal courtyard and mini golf course. They are all air conditioned and come with a TV and fridge. Breakfast at the Qawra Palace is buffet style and includes both sweet and savoury items such as eggs, sausages and cereal. The restaurant serves international cuisine at lunch and dinner. There is a large, internal garden with tables and chairs. You will find 2 gift shops and a café with free newspapers. Evening entertainment is provided. This 4-star hotel is 25 metres from the nearest bus stop and 700 metres from Bugibba centre. St. Julian's is 10 minutes' drive away.

name: Number 11 St Julian's Malta - Handwritten Collection
address: 11, Triq Schreiber, Paceville, St. Julian's STJ 3103
description: Number 11 St. Julian´s Malta - Handwritten Collection offers adult only accommodation having 91 trendy, contemporary styled rooms, an all year around heated roof pool, pool bar and Hammetts Mestizo Bar and Restaurant. Number 11 is perfectly located in the business and nightlife district of St. Julian´saccorhotels.com

name: Casa Leon Malta
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and air conditioning, as well as towels and bed sheets. Other amenities include an electric kettle, housekeeping, guidebooks and/or recommendations, and a hair dryer.Expedia

name: Holm Boutique & Spa - Ik Collection
description: Situated in St Julian's, 600 metres from Balluta Bay Beach, HOLM Boutique & SPA - IK Collection features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The hotel has an indoor pool, hot tub and room service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms also boast a kitchenette with a toaster. At HOLM Boutique & SPA - IK Collection the rooms have bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or Full English/Irish breakfast. HOLM Boutique & SPA - IK Collection offers a sun terrace. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Exiles Beach, Fond Ghadir Beach and Qui-Si-Sana Beach. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 9 km from HOLM Boutique & SPA - IK Collection.

name: AX Sunny Coast Resort & Spa
address: Qawra Bay, Saint Paul’s Bay SPB 1981
description: Sunny Coast offers modern, self-catering apartments, all with a private balcony. It is set in Qawra, one of the most beautiful bays on the island of Malta. The resort offers spectacular views across the bay, the Mediteranean Sea, and the Maltese Islands. Each apartment has a contemporary design and is complete with a kitchenette and balcony. On site you will find a wide range of facilities including a leisure and fitness centre, plus a squash court. You can relax on the beach, in the swimming pools (both indoor and outdoor), or in one of the 3 hot tubs.

name: The Duke Boutique Hotel
description: The Duke Boutique Hotel is located in the centre of Victoria, on the island of Gozo, next to Villa Rundle Gardens. The property is located within a shopping complex and guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. All rooms are non-smoking, sound-proof and feature classic contemporary design, luxurious mattress and pillows, high textured sheets and towels. Rooms are equipped with air conditioning and heating, minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. They offer a 42" flat-screen TV, laptop safe, USB ports and free high speed WiFi. The bathroom features a shower or bath tub, free slippers and toiletries. A luxurious breakfast with local and traditional items is served daily. It also provides special dietary requirements. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including horse riding, snorkelling and diving. The hotel also offers bike hire. Gozo Ferry Terminal is 6 km from the property.

name: Waterfront
description: The Waterfront Hotel is set in central Malta, along the sea promenade of Sliema, and features views of Sliema's port, the Manoel Island and Valletta. The property is 4 km from some of Malta's most popular beaches. This hotel features a restaurant, bar and free WiFi throughout. All rooms are air-conditioned, and feature a balcony, most with views of the sea, and an en suite bathroom. Each also has a minibar, TV and safe. A buffet breakfast is available daily at The Waterfront Hotel, and guests can enjoy light snacks at the bar or have dinner at the on-site Regatta Restaurant. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from Tigné shopping mall, and restaurants and shops are found in the immediate surroundings. Sliema Ferry Port is 600 metres away. Malta International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Alavits Hotel by ST Hotels
address: Sir F Ponsomby Street, Gżira GZR 1026
description: Set 1.1 km from Rock Beach, Alavits Hotel by ST Hotels offers 3-star accommodation in Il-Gżira and features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a terrace and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The hotel has family rooms. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Alavits Hotel by ST Hotels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Qui-Si-Sana Beach, Balluta Bay Beach and Love Monument. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 8 km from Alavits Hotel by ST Hotels.

name: Sunseeker Holiday Complex
address: Trejqet il-Kulpara, Bugibba, Saint Paul’s Bay SPB 04
description: Only 150 metres from Bugibba's rocky and sandy beaches and a 5-minute walk from central Bugibba, Sunseeker Holiday Complex offers 2 pools and a fitness centre. The Sunseeker offers a combination of apartments and hotel rooms. Decorated with calm colours, the Sunseekers' apartments have a dining area with kitchen, private bathroom and a balcony. Air-conditioning and heating is available, seasonally. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Sea-view apartments can be booked. The rooms have tea and coffee making facilities and a fridge. During summer guests can access the rooftop pool surrounded by a terrace with sunbeds and parasols, while during the rest of the year they can swim indoor. Breakfast is included with the Hotel rooms and can be booked at a supplement with the Apartments. Guests wanting to enjoy moments of relax can book a session in the gym or the sauna. Parking spaces are free yet subject to availability. The residence is a 2-minute walk from the Sajf bus stop and 300 metres from the main bus terminus providing links to the seaside and Luqa Airport. At the Cirkewwa Harbour, situated in the northern tip of the island, you can board a ferry to visit the beautiful Gozo island.

name: Doubletree by Hilton Malta
description: Beautiful located at the waters edge, the Dolmen Hotel is the perfect retreat for an island holiday in Malta. Our hotel facilities include 488 guest rooms + suites, a variety of 7 restaurants & bars and 6 pools to choose from, an Inhouse Casino,state of the art conference facilities + meeting rooms, stunning wedding venues and Free WiFi so guests can stay connected throughout their stay. To ensure an utterly memorable vacation, take advantage of our spacious Amazonia Beach lido, 4 outdoor pools, kids' pool, PADI diving school and water sports centre. Indulge in a relaxing treatment at the Myoka leading Spa in Malta or reenergise in one of the two heated indoor pools, fitness room, hydro massage, and sauna. Animation activities are provided on a daily basis together with a kids club during the summer months and Daily entertainment is held during the evenings. As one of the best quality Malta hotels, the Dolmen Hotel also provides a multi-storey car park with over 400 car spaces. Discover the warmth of traditional Maltese hospitality, the flavours of authentic cuisine and the excitement of the Mediterranean – experience the vacation you deserve with the Dolmen Hotel.FarePortal

name: Radisson Blu Golden Sands Resort & Spa, Golden Bay
address: Golden Bay, Mlh 5510 Mellieha, Malta Mellieha, Mellieha MLH 5510
description: Set into the sandy coast of Malta's Golden Bay, the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Malta Golden Sands includes a large swimming pool, a adult only pool and a children's pool. It also offers a private beach and a spa. Rooms are large and luxurious. Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Malta Golden Sands enjoys a quiet, private setting, with peaceful views of the sea and the surrounding countryside. It is a 10-minute drive from the harbour where ferries leave for Gozo Comino. The spa extends over 1000 m² of space, and the resort's Leisure Centre offers stunning views of the sea from its large windows overlooking the bay. Rooms are furnished with modern decorations and offer a balcony with sea or countryside views. During summer the rate includes 1 parasol and 2 sun loungers per room.

name: Malta Marriott Hotel & Spa
address: 39 Main Street, Balluta Bay, St. Julian's STJ 1017
description: The Malta Marriott Hotel and Spa located metres from Balluta beach, alongside a tranquil seafront promenade within the bustling, cosmopolitan St. Julian’s town and a 20-minute drive from Valletta, a European capital of culture city. Our newly €30M refurbished hotel, combines luxurious charm and the relaxed feel of a Mediterranean spa, with well-appointed premium category rooms and luxury suites. With four diverse restaurants and two bars, our luxury hotel has something for every palate. The M Lounge offers spectacular views and the ideal space to work or relax. A rooftop pool gives leisure travelers time to soak up the sun, whilst the spa provides an array of treatments, including an indoor heated pool, Jacuzzi, sauna, steam room, fitness center and squash court. Our 5-star hotel also provides 15,000 square feet of versatile meeting and banqueting space.Marriott

name: The George, Urban Boutique Hotel
description: Set in a prime location of St. Julian's, The George Urban Boutique Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Take advantage of the hotel's facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, airport transfer. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, carpeting, separate living room, smoke detector, internet access wireless. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool, spa. Convenience and comfort makes The George Urban Boutique Hotel the perfect choice for your stay in St. Julian's.priceline.com

name: Saint Patrick's Hotel
description: This hotel is on Xlendi Bay seafront and offers air-conditioned rooms. Its restaurant features a sea-view terrace, while the rooftop terrace is equipped with sun loungers and parasols. Rooms at St. Patrick's Hotel overlook the sea, Xlendi valley or the hotel’s internal courtyard. They offer a TV, minibar and private bathroom with hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available at the 24-hour reception. Hotel St. Patrick's includes a small pool where guests can refresh themselves during the summer. The hotel is surrounded by bars, restaurants and shops in Xlendi’s centre. The bus stop for Victoria, the capital of Gozo Island, is right in front of the St. Patrick's.

name: The San Anton Hotel
address: Triq Ir Ramel San Pawl Il Bahar, Bugibba
description: Set in the sea resort of Bugibba in Malta, The San Anton Hotel offers a range of apartments and rooms with a balcony. The outdoor pool area is open throughout the year and free high-speed Wi-Fi is available. The San Anton's accommodation has simple decor and features air conditioning, a TV and a private bathroom. Balconies in most rooms and apartments have chairs and a table. Apartments also include a kitchenette. The restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. Special dietary options can be arranged upon request and snacks are available at the bar. Rocky and sandy beaches in St. Paul’s Bay are reachable within 15 minutes by foot. Bus stop is a short walk away and can leave/bring you at/from the Malta International Airport.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott St. Julian's
description: Experience the singular combination of a sleek European design, comfort and unique authenticity when staying at AC Hotel St Julian’s. Situated in heart of the city just a stone’s throw away from the beach and countless lifestyle alternatives, the property is an ideal pied-à-terre from which to explore the island’s most popular attractions. Start your day off with a breakfast tailored to your preferences. Enjoy the atmosphere of our AC Lounge serving timeless classics with a modern twist. Plunge into our rooftop pool whilst sipping on a carefully crafted cocktail. Unwind in your sophisticated guestroom with complimentary Wi-Fi, designer bedding, ergonomic workspace, state of the art technology and thoughtful amenities. Burn off some steam in our 24 hour fully equipped fitness centre. Immerse yourself into a truly Mediterranean lifestyle.Marriott

name: Barceló Fortina Malta
description: Set 500 metres from Tigné Point Beach, Barceló Fortina Malta offers 5-star accommodation in Sliema and has a bar. Offering a restaurant, the property also has an outdoor swimming pool, as well as an indoor pool and a fitness centre. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Barceló Fortina Malta provides some units with city views, and every room is fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at Barceló Fortina Malta can enjoy a buffet breakfast. MedAsia Beach is 700 metres from the hotel, while Qui-Si-Sana Beach is less than 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 9 km from Barceló Fortina Malta.

name: Euroclub Hotel
description: Euroclub Hotel is set in the heart of Qawra, on the island of Malta, 150 metres from the beach. This property offers a restaurant with bar and both an indoor pool and a non-heated outdoor pool. Your room comes with a satellite TV and a private balcony. Air conditioning is available on request and free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the property. Breakfast includes sweet and savoury food such as eggs, yoghurt, juices and hot and cold drinks. It is served in the restaurant. Hotel Euroclub is 100 metres from Bugibba Bus Station, providing you with great connections around Malta. Qawra's seafront promenade and a wide selection of shops and bars are less than a 5-minute walk away.

name: The St. George's Park Hotel
address: 3140 Dragonara Road St. Julians, Malta, St. Julian's
description: The St. George's Park is set in the heart of Paceville, Malta's most popular nightlife district. The hotel consists of 2 buildings offering rooms and studios, 300 metres from the beach. High speed WiFi is free throughout. Each room is equipped with a hair dryer. The resort features an outdoor swimming pool. The large sun terrace is equipped with parasols and sun loungers. Paceville’s nightclubs, bars and restaurants are a one-minute walk from The St. George's Park Hotel. St. Julian's bus terminus is 500 metres away, connecting the area with the rest of the island. Parking is available nearby.

name: Radisson Blu Resort, Malta St Julian's
address: St. George's Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3391
description: Set on the seafront in St. George's Bay, this 5-star hotel offers central but quiet location in St.Julians. It features 3 outdoor pools, a heated indoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and a large balcony. Air-conditioned rooms at the Radisson Blu Resort, Malta St. Julian's all come with a TV, free tea and coffee making facilities as well as bottled water upon arrival. All rooms have views of the Mediterranean Sea. An appetizing selection of snacks, wines and cocktails are available at the Bridge Bar. A generous buffet breakfast is served daily at the Kontiki restaurant. The resort also features a touch of Mediterranean cuisine at Le Bistro and outdoor casual dining at The Edge. Public transport stop to the capital city Valletta and Hop-on Hop-Off Sightseeing tour is a 2-minute walk from the property. Malta international Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Ikyk Hotel - Ik Collection
address: 5-15 Triq il-Wilga, St Julian's, St. Julian's STJ 3116
description: Ideally situated in St Julian's, IKYK Hotel- IK Collection features air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a terrace. 500 metres from St George's Bay Beach and 1.2 km from Balluta Bay Beach, the property provides a restaurant and a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, the rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms also boast a balcony. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. IKYK Hotel- IK Collection offers a continental or Full English/Irish breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Portomaso Marina, Love Monument and Bay Street Shopping Complex. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 9 km from IKYK Hotel- IK Collection.

name: Talbot and Bons Boutique Bed & Breakfast
description: Set in Gudja, 3.8 km from Hal Saflieni Hypogeum and 7.8 km from Hagar Qim, Talbot & Bons Bed & Breakfast offers accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a private bathroom with slippers and shower. A fridge and minibar are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the bed and breakfast. Talbot & Bons Bed & Breakfast offers a sun terrace. The accommodation provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Valletta Waterfront is 7.9 km from Talbot & Bons Bed & Breakfast, while Upper Barrakka Gardens is 8.5 km away. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 1 km from the bed and breakfast.

name: Hotel Ta' Cenc & Spa
description: Swimming pools, tennis courts, a private beach, and an excellent choice of cuisine for lunch and dinner; these are just a few reasons to choose Hotel Ta' Cenc. This five-star hotel boasts an impressive list of sports and leisure facilities, all on the highest point of Gozo, overlooking the cliffs. The guest rooms are housed in stone bungalows, which are spread throughout the resort. Each room comes with air conditioning and a private terrace or small garden. You could never get bored at Ta Cenc with 2 tennis courts, and 2 swimming pools; one of which has a mini pool for children and hydro massage corner.A free minibus to the private rocky beach, which is 2 km away, is available at scheduled times (high season only). Here you will find a bar and grill restaurant. Back at the hotel you can have fun with table tennis, billiards, video games, plus a host of board games. Work out at the gym and relax in the wellness centre with a heated swimming pool, Finnish sauna, hot tub, and steam bath. Pamper yourself with a solarium or massage. The professional team of staff can organise tours around Gozo. At reception you can also change currency and hire a car. The award-winning chefs prepare the finest Italian and international cuisine at the restaurant. Choose between an à la carte and set menu. Afterwards, relax out on the terrace with a drink and enjoy live music.

name: Iniala Harbour House
description: Located in Valletta and with Valletta Waterfront reachable within 1.1 km, Iniala Harbour House provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a tour desk. There is a spa and wellness centre with a terrace, indoor pool and fitness centre, as well as a sauna. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. All rooms include a kettle, while selected rooms have a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. At Iniala Harbour House every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers Full English/Irish, American or vegetarian options. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Staff speak Catalan, Czech, English and Spanish at the reception. University of Malta - Valletta Campus is 400 metres from the accommodation, while Upper Barrakka Gardens is 300 metres away. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 7 km from Iniala Harbour House.

name: Palazzo Violetta
description: Offering a year-round outdoor pool and terrace, Palazzo Violetta is located in Sliema, less than a 10-minute walk from the sea. It offers free WiFi and modern studios with a balcony and air conditioning. Some studios at the Violetta come with a kitchenette and all have a 40" flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some studios are split-level with a mezzanine sleeping area. A continental and english breakfast are served daily. There is also a bar and a 24-hour front desk. Bike hire is available here. Balluta Bay is 700 metres from the property, while Spinola Bay is 1 km away. Tigne Point is 1.7 km from Palazzo Violetta and Malta International Airport is 7.5 km away.

name: Il-Logga Boutique Hotel
address: 16 Church Street Xaghra Gozo Malta, Xagħra XRA 1234
description: Il-Logga Boutique Hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Xagħra. The property is around 2.8 km from Ramla Beach, 2.5 km from Cittadella and 5.6 km from Ta' Pinu Basilica. The hotel also provides free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms have a kettle, while selected rooms include a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. At Il-Logga Boutique Hotel every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 39 km from the accommodation.

name: Hugo's Boutique Hotel - Adults Only
address: 3200 St. George`s Road, Paceville, St Julians, St. Julian's STJ 3200
description: Daring and dramatic, Hugo’s Boutique Hotel is superbly positioned in the lively district of Paceville, St. Julian’s. It is surrounded with nightclubs, bars and discotheques. The sandy beach of St. George’s Bay is a 2 minute walk away Breakfast is served in the sister hotel, H Hotel, just a few metres away Housed over eight themed floors with their own distinct character, the 40 stylish, edgy guest rooms and suites feature all the latest in modern technology for a unique high -tech experience. All rooms come with a satellite flat-screen TV, coffee machine, minibar, iron & ironing board. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony, while some suites feature a hot tub / sauna / sea view During the summer months, guests can head to Infinity by Hugo’s rooftop pool (seasonal, May to Sep), where one can enjoy breath-taking vistas of St. George’s Bay. A Live DJ performs by the pool every afternoon (seasonal). On some evenings the hotel hosts parties on the rooftop till the early hours of the morning The Hotel shares facilities with its sister Hotel, the H Hotel. A lavish buffet breakfast is served there daily between 07.00-10.30hrs. Guest staying at Hugos’s Boutique Hotel can use H Hotel’s SPA facilities for free. Carisma SPA includes an indoor heated pool, steam room, sauna and a variety of massages (charge) The property is 400 metres from the city centre. Valletta is 8 km from H Hotel whilst, Malta International Airport is 12 km from the property.

name: Hotel Kappara
address: Triq Wied Ghollieqa, Kappara 1, San Ġwann SGN 4463
description: Offering an outdoor pool, restaurant and sun terrace, Hotel Kappara is set on a hill in San Gwann. All spacious rooms come with an LCD TV with cable channels. Sliema is 3 km away. Rooms at the Kappara have simple wooden furnishings and a small kitchenette (which can be requested at a cost). Some rooms feature a balcony. Breakfast is continental style, with ham, cheese and croissants. A cooked English breakfast is available on request. The year-round pool has a sun terrace with loungers and parasols. The nearest sandy beaches are at St. George's Bay, 4 km away. It is a 20-minute drive to Malta International Airport.

name: Coral Hotel
address: Triq Il-Korp Tal-Pijunieri, Bugibba, Bugibba SPB 1015
description: This property is conveniently located in the heart of town. The popular promenade and rock beach are within a short stroll away, whilst a cinemaplex,bars and restaurants are all at its doorstep. Direct busses to the capital city Valletta stop right opposite hotel. Rooms are modern, clean and kept in good condition. Basic amenities expected in a hotel of this category can be found in all rooms. This is a purpose built hotel blending in with its surroundings. Having just 40 rooms, this hotel offers an intimate atmosphere whilst maintaining good standards accompanied by friendly service. Facilities include a roof top pool, small fitness room, games room and bar. All guests staying at the Coral can use all facilities at the nearby sister hotel Canifor. (DB 04/09)WebBeds

name: Aparthotel Adagio Malta Central
description: Malta's leading upper midscale serviced Aparthotel offers all Accor service excellence with modern state of the art design and technology, ideal also for extended stays. The hotel's 70 Studios, One-Bedroom Apartments and Penthouses are designed in an urban casual and stylish atmosphere. The rooftop pool offers a spectacular view over the Bay, Valletta, Sliema, Gzira and Manoel island. The hotel is centrally located in a quiet residential area, near the main hospital Mater Dei and University of Malta.accorhotels.com

name: Corinthia Palace Malta
description: Corinthia Palace Malta is set on Malta Island, and provides 5-star accommodation as well as a private beach. Offering free Wi-Fi, a restaurant and an outdoor pool, the hotel is within a 10-minute walk of San Anton. Guests of Corinthia Palace Malta can start their morning at Athenaeum Spa, or enjoy the many fitness and leisure facilities, including pilates classes, fitness classes and outdoor tennis courts. There is also free public parking on site for those with a car. It also has a fitness centre with a swimming pool, a sauna and outdoor tennis courts. The rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV, a mini bar and a private balcony. They all feature a telephone, a radio and a desk. Each morning, guests can wake up to breakfast at Rickshaw or Orange Grove Brasserie. In the evening, guests are invited to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide variety of eating options are also found nearby. Within a 20-minute drive of St. John's Co-Cathedral and Malta International Airport, Corinthia Palace Malta offers an airport shuttle service for those staying at the property. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Attard.Revato

name: Palazzo Castagna Boutique Hotel
description: Palazzo Castagna Boutique Hotel features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Għaxaq. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms here will provide you with a kitchenette with a fridge, an oven and a microwave. At Palazzo Castagna Boutique Hotel every room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an à la carte breakfast. With staff speaking Arabic, English, Spanish and French, guidance is available at the reception. St George's Bay Beach is 2.8 km from Palazzo Castagna Boutique Hotel, while Hal Saflieni Hypogeum is 3.2 km away. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 3 km from the hotel.

name: Relax Inn Hotel
address: Halel Street, Bugibba Spb 04, Saint Pauls Bay, Bugibba, Bugibba SPB 04
description: The Relax Inn Hotel is a small 3 star hotel situated in the heart of Bugibba, a short walk from the seafront promenade and the bus station. There are a number of common areas, including a bar, games room, and lounge with cable TV and DVD library. Wi-Fi is free in the lobby. Rooms at the Relax Inn are all en suite and come with a tea and coffee maker. A safety deposit box and fridge are available at an additional cost. The Relax Inn is close to Bugibba's main square and its many restaurants, shops, and nightclubs.

name: Hilton Malta
address: Portomaso, St. Julians, Malta Ptm 01, Malta, St. Julian's PTM 01
description: Hilton Malta is located in the Portomaso Yacht Marina, just 15 minutes away from UNESCO World Heritage Capital City Valletta. Relax in stylish and spacious guest rooms with year-round Mediterranean sunshine. Each of the guest rooms are rich with Mediterranean tones and furnishings. Executive Rooms and Suites also include access to the Executive Lounge.  Three on-site restaurants offer delicious Mediterranean cuisine and impressive dining and cocktail options. Dine on the beach during summer months, or enjoy Royal Thai cuisine choices in a unique setting at the Blue Elephant Restaurant. Indulge in the vast amenities at this Malta hotel including a day spa with a sauna and steam rooms with themed treatment rooms and over 80 specialized treatments, outdoor pools and one indoor pool, fully-equipped gymnasium and full aerobic timetable, tennis and squash courts. Hilton Malta features an extensive range of meeting rooms, with a conference center hosting up to 1330 delegates. Choose a spectacular seafront setting for a wedding, from an extravagant celebration or an intimate gathering of family and friends.Official Hotel Information

name: Hotel Verdi
description: No description found

name: The Westin Dragonara Resort, Malta
address: Stj02 Dragonara Road, St. Julians, St. Julian's STJ 3143
description: Standing apart on a natural peninsula fringed by the sea, The Westin Dragonara Resort, Malta brings warm-hearted, luxurious Mediterranean living to a vibrant, historic island. The property has an enviable beachside position and is accessed via private gateway, inscribed with Virgil thoughtful proverb, “God made this gem for us”. A reflection of Malta’s generous character lives through the way each guest is welcomed with easy-going charm and personalized attention. Our family resort features 408 rooms and suites which have been recently renovated. Landscaped around age-old artefacts, sunken gardens and impressive pools, our 5-star hotel has stunning ocean views throughout. The villa-style lobby is naturally light and spacious where floor-to-ceiling windows and sun-drenched terrace overlook unspoiled coastline. A multi-generational favorite, it is equally appealing to both leisure and business visitors, supported by the team organic approach to wellbeing, informed by the island’s rich culture.Marriott

name: Rooms by Alexandra Hotel
description: In a prime location in St Julian's, ROOMS by Alexandra Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a shared lounge, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The units in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. At ROOMS by Alexandra Hotel every room has a balcony, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. The accommodation offers a terrace. Languages spoken at the reception include German, English, French and Italian, and guests are invited to request information on the area when needed. Popular points of interest near ROOMS by Alexandra Hotel include St George's Bay Beach, Balluta Bay Beach and Portomaso Marina. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Bayview Hotel By St Hotels
description: Bayview Hotel & Apartments offers a 24-hour internet café, and a rooftop swimming pool overlooking the harbour at Sliema. Some accommodation comes with a balcony, and some feature sea views. Rooms come with a private bathroom, satellite TV and Air Conditioning. Bayview Hotel has a range of dining options including an Asian restaurant complete with Indian and Chinese cuisine, and a continental buffet. The spa and fitness centre offers massage and beauty treatments, and a thermal pool with sea views. Bayview is located a 15-minute walk from Sliema town centre, and just a few steps away from boat trips around the island and to the capital Valletta. Buses to Valletta, St Julian's, and across the island stop right outside the property. Malta International Airport is just 9 km away. The hotel offers a shuttle service on request. This is our guests' favourite part of Il-Gżira, according to independent reviews. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 9.1 for a one-person stay.

name: Urban Valley Resort & Spa
address: Triq Wied Ghollieqa, San Ġwann SGN 4437
description: Set in San Ġwann, Urban Valley Resort enjoys a quiet location just a 15-minute drive from Valletta. The property features 2 outdoor swimming pools and 2 tennis courts. Dining options include 2 restaurants and bars. Free high-speed WiFi is available throughout. The Urban Valley offers rooms and suites. All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV, coffee/tea making facilities, and minibar. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, with free toiletries and a hairdryer provided for your convenience. Guests can enjoy free use of the Turkish bath, sauna and gym. A heated pool is also available on site. Breakfast is available each morning at the property. Business travellers can enjoy the on-site business centre. Free private parking is available at the resort. A complimentary, scheduled shuttle service is available to/from Sliema Ferries, Valletta and St. Julian's. The resort is also within a 10-minute drive of St Julian's, while Malta International Airport is about 10 km away.

name: Hotel Valentina
address: Dobbie Street, Paceville, St. Julian's STJ 3081
description: Set in the lively district of Paceville in central St. Julian’s, the stylish design Hotel Valentina offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi throughout, and air-conditioned rooms with ultra-modern furnishings. Free private parking, a seasonal bar and lift are available on site. Rooms at the Hotel Valentina come with an iPod docking station, satellite LCD TV as well as a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and shower. Some rooms boast a furnished balcony. Guests can enjoy a drink in the lounge bar open daily and serves a range of cocktails and wines. Breakfast is a varied buffet and is served in the bright breakfast hall. A few steps away, a restaurant under the same ownership, serves Mediterranean dishes. The property is located a 5-minute walk from both Portomaso Marina and Spinola Bay. It is a 10-minute walk to the mall, Dragonara Casino and an easy stroll to the nearest rocky and sandy beaches.

name: Cesca's Boutique Hotel
description: Located in Xlendi, Cesca's Boutique Hotel features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a shared lounge. Featuring a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property has a restaurant. All units come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a bath, free toiletries and a desk. Guest rooms include a wardrobe. The hotel offers a continental or buffet breakfast. Cesca Boutique Hotel offers a sun terrace. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at the accommodation. Victoria is 2.5 km from Cesca's Boutique Hotel.

name: Topaz Hotel
address: Triq Censu Tanti, Bugibba 3025, Saint Pauls Bay, Bugibba, Saint Paul’s Bay SPB 3025
description: Set in the popular seaside resort of Bugibba, Hotel Topaz is less than 10 minutes' walk from the beach. It offers indoor and outdoor swimming pools and a large sun terrace with sun loungers. Rooms are air conditioned and feature a TV and en suite bathroom. Some have a balcony and some overlook the outdoor pool. The Emerald Restaurant is open all year round at breakfast, lunch and dinner. Pizzeria Altavilla opens in the evenings, serving delicious pastas and pizzas. The Topaz Hotel provides live entertainment most nights. The indoor pool is heated and is open during winter. The outdoor pool has a children's paddling area.

name: Porto Azzurro Aparthotel
address: 4042 Ridott Street, Xemxija, St Paul's Bay, Malta, Saint Paul’s Bay --
description: The Porto Azzurro Aparthotel, in Xemxija Bay, is prominently situated overlooking the picturesque St. Paul’s Bay with breathtaking views of the Maltese countryside. Rooms and apartments at Porto Azzurro Aparthotel come with satellite TV, air conditioning and free WiFi. Apartments also include a kitchenette with a fridge. Amenities include a 24-hour reception, restaurant, bar and pizzeria. Wellness facilities include an outdoor fresh-water swimming pool with children’s section, waterfall, and a pool bar with spacious sunbathing area.

name: Palazzo Consiglia - Ik Collection
description: Situated in Valletta, a 3-minute walk from University of Malta - Valletta Campus, Palazzo Consiglia - IK Collection features an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace. The property is around a 9-minute walk from Upper Barrakka Gardens and 700 metres from Manoel Theatre. All rooms have a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms will provide you with a seating area. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property. Spa and wellness facilities including a hot tub and a hammam are at guests' disposal during their stay at the accommodation. The property also provides a 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near Palazzo Consiglia - IK Collection include Auberge de Castille, Museum in Valletta Malta and The Malta Experience. Malta International Airport is 8 km from the property.

name: Palais Le Brun
description: Located in Valletta's city centre, Palais Le Brun boasts an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi. The accommodation offers a business centre, a concierge service and buying tickets for guests. All air-conditioned, rooms come with a flat-screen TV and private bathroom with either shower or bath tub. Some units also features views of the sea. A continental, à la carte or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near the hotel include University of Malta - Valletta Campus, Upper Barrakka Gardens and Manoel Theatre. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 6 km from the property.

name: LABRANDA Riviera Hotel & Spa
description: Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa is located in one of the best-preserved areas of northern Malta and overlooks the scenic Marfa Bay. Unspoiled views over the islands of Gozo and Comino create an idyllic Mediterranean atmosphere of relaxation. Guests of the LABRANDA Riviera Hotel & Spa have access to a wide range of amenities, including two outdoor seawater swimming pools, an indoor seawater pool and a full-service Spa Centre. At Elysium Spa guests can choose from a wide range of therapy and beauty treatments. True relaxation, however, requires a holistic approach. It is more than just enjoying sea views, swimming pools and spa treatments. Indulging in superior food is also part of a comforting and rejuvenating vacation. The ability to savour an appetisingly crafted quality meal or taste a snack by the pool is among the most important experiences for guests of a Select Hotel. Therefore, Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa does its best to offer a wide array of world-class restaurants as well as bars for its valued guests. The hotel is located in Mellieha, a popular and picturesque village in Malta. It offers visitors a nice mix of experiences, from idyllic sandy beaches and authentic restaurants, to several historical sites. The latter include Saint Agathas Tower, the Church of our Lady Victory, and the Mellieha WWII air-raid shelters. Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa also provides adventure seeking guests with the ability to take part in various scuba diving activities. Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa is the perfect choice for travelers looking for a diverse vacation in the middle of the Mediterranean Sea.iHotelier/iStay

name: Intercontinental Malta
address: St. George's Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3310
description: InterContinental Malta has established itself as the Mediterranean’s leading hotel of distinction. Located in the prime area of St. George’s Bay in St. Julian's, just seven kilometres from Valletta. All 481 rooms are elegantly furnished, having all the comforts expected of a luxury hotel. With a variety of restaurants and bars, the hotel offers varied cuisine at all times of the day. The leisure facilities include three pools, a kids club, a Fitness Centre, a spa, a beach club and room service.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Lulu Boutique Hotel
address: 29, Triq L-Innu Malti, Żebbuġ, Gozo ZBG 3505
description: Located in Żebbuġ and with Hagar Qim reachable within 6.8 km, Lulu Boutique Hotel provides express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a bar. Featuring room service, this property also provides guests with a barbecue. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms are equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms come with a balcony and others also offer pool views. At Lulu Boutique Hotel each room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and Italian options. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Żebbuġ, like snorkelling. Lulu Boutique Hotel provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Valletta Waterfront is 7.2 km from the hotel, while Hal Saflieni Hypogeum is 7.6 km away. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 4 km from Lulu Boutique Hotel.

name: Villa Serenity B&B
description: Set in Sannat, Villa Serenity B&B offers free WiFi, and guests can enjoy an outdoor swimming pool, a garden and a shared lounge. Private parking is available on site. Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries.
