Some units feature a balcony and/or a patio with city views. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or Italian options. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the bed and breakfast, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Mġarr ix-Xini Beach is 1.4 km from Villa Serenity B&B, while Cittadella is 3.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Malta International, 39 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ushuaia Playa Xemxija Boutique Hotel
description: Situated in St Paul's Bay, 400 metres from Fekruna Beach, Ushuaia Playa Xemxija Boutique Hotel offers beachfront accommodation and various facilities, such as a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property has a seasonal outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and terrace. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Ushuaia Playa Xemxija Boutique Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms also boast a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at Ushuaia Playa Xemxija Boutique Hotel can enjoy an à la carte or a continental breakfast. The hotel offers a hot tub. Mistra Bay Beach is 1.1 km from Ushuaia Playa Xemxija Boutique Hotel, while Tax-Xama Bay Beach is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 19 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Mistral St. Julian's, Affiliated by Meliá
address: Luigi Apap Street c/w, Francis Zammit, St. Julian's STJ 3225
description: No description found

name: The Embassy Valletta Hotel
description: The Embassy Valletta Hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and restaurant in Valletta. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides an ATM, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. At the hotel every room is fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Each room has a kettle, while some rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. At The Embassy Valletta Hotel rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include University of Malta - Valletta Campus, Upper Barrakka Gardens and Valletta Waterfront. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 8 km from The Embassy Valletta Hotel.

name: Allegro Hotel
description: Allegro Hotel offers comfortable accommodation in a convenient location in St. Julian’s, just 250 metres from the Blue Flag beach at St George’s Bay. You will enjoy great facilities at the Allegro, including free WiFi internet access and a fantastic rooftop swimming pool and sun deck. Soak up the sun here, while taking in fantastic views of the Mediterranean sea and the pretty Maltese towns below. Just 2 minutes’ walk from the Allegro you will find St Julian’s bus terminal, allowing you to travel all over Malta cheaply and easily, whether you want to visit new beaches or check out Valletta, the historic capital city. Malta’s trendiest bays, where you will find a large range of shops, bars and cafés are also just a short walk away. Parking is easy near the hotel.

name: Marco Polo Party Hostel
address: Ross Street, Paceville, St. Julian's STJ 3225
description: Featuring free WiFi, Marco Polo Party Hostel offers rooms and dormitory rooms in St Julian's, 300 metres from Spinola Bay. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar, and shared facilities such as the sun terrace where guests can use the BBQ facilities or enjoy a drink. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property, and the hostel organises events and parties on site. The modern and colourful units have air conditioning and parquet floors. Rooms and dormitory rooms come with either a shared bathroom, or an en suite one. The hostel also offers bike hire and car hire. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 7 km from Marco Polo Party Hostel.

name: The Gomerino Hotel
description: Situated in Valletta and with Qui-Si-Sana Beach reachable within 2.5 km, The Gomerino Hotel features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property has a year-round outdoor pool, indoor pool, fitness centre and shared lounge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At The Gomerino Hotel the rooms have bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and vegetarian options. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna. Popular points of interest near The Gomerino Hotel include University of Malta - Valletta Campus, Upper Barrakka Gardens and Valletta Waterfront. The nearest airport is Malta International, 7 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ta' Tereza In Manwel Dimech
description: Set in Sliema, 1.1 km from Balluta Bay Beach, Ta' Tereza In Manwel Dimech offers air-conditioned rooms and a rooftop pool. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also has a restaurant and a sun terrace. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The units in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV with streaming services. Featuring a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, rooms at Ta' Tereza In Manwel Dimech also provide guests with free WiFi, while certain rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the accommodation every room includes bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at Ta' Tereza In Manwel Dimech. Popular points of interest near the guest house include Fond Ghadir Beach, Exiles Beach and Love Monument. The nearest airport is Malta International, 8 km from Ta' Tereza In Manwel Dimech, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Corinthia Hotel St Georges Bay
description: Combining a luxurious setting with premium facilities, Corinthia Hotel St Georges Bay offers a swimming pool, a private beach and free Wi-Fi. It is located a 20-minute car ride from Malta International Airport and an airport shuttle is available for guests. Guests of the hotel can begin their day at Richard Geres Personal Training, or enjoy the various fitness amenities, such as a diving centre. It also includes family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families both large and small, plus a kids pool and babysitting/child services. It also has its very own spa and wellness centre, Apollo Day. The rooms are air conditioned and include a mini bar, a private balcony and a coffee maker. They each offer slippers, heating and a flat-screen TV. Guests of Corinthia Hotel St Georges Bay are invited to sample regional and international cuisine at Fra Martino, or try local dishes at Caviar & Bull. Dining options at the hotel include Le Café and Henry J. Bean's Bar & Grill. Guests can also enjoy a drink at Pearl Lounge. The area around Corinthia Hotel St Georges Bay has a range of cafés and restaurants. St Julians is within a 20-minute walk of the hotel, and local sightseeing information can be found at the tour desk.Revato

name: Grand Harbour Hotel
description: Set in the city centre of Malta's Valletta and 200 metres from the harbour-view promenade, Grand Harbour Hotel offers free Wi-Fi throughout and a sun terrace. Reception is open 24 hours a day. All air conditioned, the rooms feature a flat-screen TV, an electric kettle and an en suite bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. Some have views of the harbour. Each morning you can enjoy a continental-style breakfast with pastries, cereal and yoghurt. Numerous cafes, shops and restaurants serving seafood and international dishes are available a 3-minute walk from the hotel. The central bus terminus is 700 metres away. From here buses reach every beach and village on the island.

name: Deep Blu Boutique Hotel
description: No description found

name: Holiday Inn Express Malta
address: ST. George's Bay, ST. Julian's, MT, Stj-33, St. Julian's
description: Stylish St. Julian’s hotel near the beach, with free Wi-Fi and breakfast includedHoliday Inn Express® Malta hotel is in the heart of the seaside town of St. Julian’s, only 18 minutes’ drive from Malta International Airport.Two minutes’ walk from the hotel, you can sunbathe next to the sparkling Mediterranean Sea at sandy St. George’s Bay beach, while the nearby Bay Street Shopping Complex offers shops, restaurants and family entertainment, with a casino and a cinema next door. The hotel’s smart lobby lounge is ideal for informal meetings, and the neighbouring InterContinental® Malta houses the state-of-the-art IACC conference centre. Less than 20 minutes’ drive away in the fortified 16th-century capital, Valletta, you can explore baroque treasures such as St. John’s Co-Cathedral, and browse designer stores.At this hotel you can enjoy:- Express Start Buffet Breakfast consisting of hot and cold beverages, selective choice of cold and hot items. - Free Wi-Fi- Business Centre facilitiesContemporary Generation 4 rooms all have desks and LCD TVs, plus they feature blackout shades and a pillow menu to help you get a good night’s sleep. Wake up with a power shower, and a delicious buffet breakfast is included in the room rate. The bright Express Café & Bar serves snacks and light meals all day, and is the perfect place to meet friends and colleagues.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: 66 Saint Pauls & Spa
description: Set in Valletta, 66 Saint Paul's & Spa is a 2-minute walk from University of Malta - Valletta Campus and provides a terrace, spa and a summer outdoor pool with city views. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Upper Barrakka Gardens and Casa Rocca Piccola. The elegantly furnished rooms at the guest house come with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms also boast a city view. The Myoka Sixty Six Spa offers exclusive treatments including cappuccino body scrubs, champagne manicure and 24k gold facials. The accommodation offers a buffet-style continental breakfast. A 24-hour front desk and a bar are also available at the property. Popular points of interest near 66 Saint Paul's & Spa include National Museum of Archaeology, Auberge de Castille and Manoel Theatre. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, a 15-minute drive away.

name: Santa Lucia Boutique Hotel
description: Situated in Santa Luċija, 2.1 km from Xlendi Beach, Santa Lucia Boutique Hotel features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a hot tub. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Santa Lucia Boutique Hotel rooms come with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the accommodation. Cittadella is 2.5 km from Santa Lucia Boutique Hotel, while Ta' Pinu Basilica is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 41 km from the hotel.

name: Sliema Hotel By St Hotels
description: This seafront hotel is in Sliema city centre, surrounded by shops, pubs and restaurants. It features air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. The spacious rooms at Sliema Hotel come with a private bathroom. Some overlook the sea and the bastions of Valletta. Sliema Bus Terminus and ferry dock are less than 500 metres away, providing great connections in and around the island. The Point Shopping Mall is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Bikes and scooters can be rented at the reception, open 24 hours a day.

name: Luna Holiday Complex
description: Luna Holiday Complex offers self-catering accommodation 400 metres away from the beach on Mellieha Bay. It features 2 outdoor swimming pools, an indoor pool for winter months and a range of bars and restaurants. Luna Holiday apartments are well equipped with a kitchenette and living area. Free WiFi is available in the lobby. A continental breakfast is available daily. This 3-star complex also features a small grocery market, a diving centre and Fitness Gym.

name: Domus Zamittello
description: Domus Zamittello offers luxury accommodation in a restored 17th century palazzo in Valletta. The property is just as one enters Valletta, overlooking Republic Street and Freedom Square. Domus Zamittello offers an à la carte breakfast with food cooked fresh to order. It is around a 3-minute walk from Upper Barrakka Gardens and 500 metres from Manoel Theatre. Casa Rocca Piccola is 400 metres from the property. The 24-hour front desk can offer helpful tips for getting around the area. National Museum of Archaeology is 300 metres from Domus Zamittello. Malta International Airport is 6 km from the property.

name: Hotel Levante St. Julian's, Affiliated by Meliá
address: Sant' Andrija Street, St. Julian's STJ 9023
description: No description found

name: The Segond Hotel
description: The Segond Hotel has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Xagħra. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The Segond Hotel features some units that have a balcony, and every room comes with a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian options. Ramla Beach is 1.4 km from The Segond Hotel, while Marsalforn Beach is 2.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 39 km from the hotel.

name: Lure Hotel & Spa- Adults Only
description: Situated within 3.5 km of Popeye Village and 11 km of Malta National Aquarium, Lure Hotel & Spa - Adults Only features rooms in Mellieħa. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel has an indoor pool, year-round outdoor pool and terrace, and guests can grab a bite to eat in the restaurant. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Rooms include a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while certain rooms have a balcony and others also boast city views. At the hotel each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers à la carte, continental or Full English/Irish options. At Lure Hotel & Spa - Adults Only guests are welcome to take advantage of a Turkish bath. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Mellieha Bay Beach, Santa Maria Estate Beach and Ghadira Bay Beach. The nearest airport is Malta International, 21 km from Lure Hotel & Spa - Adults Only, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Qawra Point Holiday Complex
address: Tourist Road Qawra 30, Saint Paul’s Bay SPB 1020
description: The Qawra Point Holiday Complex is within walking distance from Qawra's promenade. It offers apartments with a TV and balcony. Qawra Point is a few minutes' stroll away from Bugibba Square, with its many shops, bars, clubs and restaurants. Qawra Holiday Complex has a well-stocked bar and a pool/billiards rooms with WiFi access.

name: White Star
address: latmija street, Naxxar, Saint Paul’s Bay NXR 6111
description: No description found

name: Beach Garden Hotel
address: St. George's Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3302
description: Set opposite St. George's Beach in Saint Julian’s, Beach Garden Hotel features an outdoor pool, a restaurant with veranda and a sea-view terrace. Rooms all come with air conditioning, and free WiFi is available throughout. The popular area of Paceville is a 5-minute walk away. With garden views, all rooms at the Hotel Beach Garden all include a flat-screen TV, tiled floors and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and bath or shower. Other facilities at the hotel include a garden, bar and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel also offers bike and car hire. Spinola Bay is 750 metres from Beach Garden Hotel. Malta International Airport is a 17-minute drive away.

name: Rosselli
description: Rosselli offers accommodation in the heart of Valletta. Set in a 17th-century building formerly owned by a member of the Knights of Malta, the hotel combines Baroque architecture and modern facilities, including free WiFi throughout. A restaurant and a bar are also available on site. All air conditioned, units at Rosselli feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom equipped with free toiletries and a hairdryer. A continental breakfast with a selection of sweet and savoury products, as well as fresh fruit is available daily, while the Michelin-starred restaurant boasts a sophisticated menu and dessert selection. For any tips on how to get around or what to do in the area, guests can ask at the reception, available 24/7. Rosselli is less than a 10-minute walk from the city gate. The hotel is 400 metres from St. John's Co-Cathedral and 1 km from Upper Barrakka Gardens. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 8 km away.

name: Grand Hotel Excelsior
address: 1810 Great Siege Road, Floriana Valletta, Valletta FRN 1810
description: Luxury 5 Star Hotel and Beach Resort with private sandy beach and private 30 Berth Yacht Marina.Located by the Waters edge and in close proximity to the Capital City of Malta, Valletta.The hotel is embraced by the historical bastion walls of the World Heritage City of Valletta. The spectacular water's edge location is breathtaking, blending contemporary vision with the rich history that graces Marsamxett Harbour and Valletta. A Grand Ballroom, an Exhibition Hall and meeting rooms; the majority having natural light, The hotel offers over 4,000 square meters of versatile conference & banqueting facilities with complimentary WIFI also available throughout the hotel.iHotelier/iStay

name: AX The Victoria Hotel
description: Offering a rooftop terrace with pool, The Victoria Hotel - AX Hotels is a 4-star boutique hotel in Sliema centre, 1 km from the Point Shopping Mall and just a 5-minute walk from the seaside promenade. It features a luxury spa and free WiFi is available throughout. Rooms are spacious and come with either a fresh Mediterranean blue design or elegant Victorian décor. All air conditioned, they also feature tea and coffee-making facilities and a Smart TV with international channels. Guests are welcomed into the charming Victorian lobby with a fireplace and Chesterfield sofas. The entire top floor is dedicated to wellness and includes a gym, indoor pool and spa. A buffet breakfast is available each morning, while The Copperfield's Restaurant offers dishes from the Mediterranean cuisine. Penny Black Bar serves English teas and refreshing cocktails. Taxi services can be arranged at reception.

name: The Phoenicia Malta
description: Renowned for its excellent quality of service the hotel is located on the doorstep to the City of Valletta offering views over The Grand Harbour, historic Valletta, the hotel’s 7 acres of private gardens, or Floriana. The Phoenicia Malta offers extensive services including a relaxing Spa and Gym, indoor and outdoor swimming pools, iconic Palm Court Lounge, The Club Bar and 2 Restaurants. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from both the ferry terminal to Sliema and Barrakka Lift, which links to Valletta Waterfront ferry terminal and promenade. The Phoenicia Malta’s infinity pool sits at the bottom of the hotel’s gardens against the beautiful Bastions and overlooks the harbour. During spring and summer, the Bastion Pool Bar & Restaurant is open for dining and beverages. An extensive breakfast buffet offering both hot and cold items including specialty coffees is served daily in The Phoenix Restaurant. The Phoenix Restaurant is open daily offering a menu which features a combination of Maltese and Mediterranean dishes. Rooms are elegantly appointed with Mediterranean tiled floors. All air-conditioned, they also feature a minibar and tea and coffee-making facilities. They are all equipped with complimentary wireless internet access, and Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

name: The Burrow Guest House
address: The Burrow, No. 3, Sqaq No. 4, Tarxien TXN 1740
description: Set in a unique 15th-century house, this family-run guest house lies in the small village of Tarxien. The ancient Tarxien Temples are a 5-minute walk away. WiFi is free throughout the property. Rooms at The Burrow Host feature antique furnishings and exposed stone walls. Each includes tiled or parquet floors. All rooms come with air conditioning, balcony or a patio. The property was renovated in February of 2018. The Burrow Host Guest House is 6 km from Valletta and a 7-minute taxi ride from Malta International Airport. Sandy beaches can be reached in 10 minutes by buses that stop just outside.

name: Pebbles Resort
description: Located in St Paul's Bay, just metres from the Bugibba area, Pebbles Resort provides 2 restaurants, an outdoor swimming pool, a gym, a heated indoor pool and a hot tub. WiFi is free in shared areas and in all rooms. The 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, room service, ATM machine and currency exchange for guests. With pool or city views, the air-conditioned rooms here include a balcony, fridge, flat-screen TV with international channels, tea/coffee making facilities, and a safe. The private bathroom has toiletries and bath towels. There are 2 bars on site. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Bugibba Square, Perched Beach and Malta National Aquarium. The nearest airport is Malta International, 17 km from Pebbles Resort, and the property offers assistance with paid shuttle service arrangements.

name: L'Ghorfa
description: Set 2.1 km from Cittadella, L'Ghorfa offers an infinity pool, a bar and accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and slippers. A continental, Italian or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The bed and breakfast provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. A car rental service is available at L'Ghorfa, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Ta' Pinu Basilica is 5.3 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Malta International, 39 km from L'Ghorfa, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Soleil B&B Gozo
description: Set in Għarb, Soleil B&B Gozo offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. A fridge is also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Continental and Full English/Irish breakfast options are available every morning at the bed and breakfast. If you would like to discover the area, walking tours is possible in the surroundings. Dwejra Bay Beach is 3 km from Soleil B&B Gozo, while Ta' Pinu Basilica is 600 metres away. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 42 km from the accommodation.

name: Ad Hoc B&B
address: Triq Ghajn Qamar Tamarisk, Xaghra Xra2601, Xagħra XRA 2601
description: Located in Il-Pergla, 1.1 km from Ramla Beach and 2.5 km from Marsalforn Beach, Ad Hoc B&B provides accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Some units include a terrace and/or a balcony with pool or inner courtyard views. A continental breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Ad Hoc B&B, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Cittadella is 5.5 km from the accommodation, while Ta' Pinu Basilica is 8.4 km away. The nearest airport is Malta International, 39 km from Ad Hoc B&B, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Palazzo Bifora
description: Palazzo Bifora features an outdoor swimming pool, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Mdina. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi. Certain units at the property include a balcony with a city view. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Palazzo Bifora every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers à la carte, continental or Full English/Irish options. Hagar Qim is 10 km from the accommodation, while University of Malta is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Malta International, 8 km from Palazzo Bifora, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sprachcaffe International
description: The Sprachcaffe is a tourist complex of unique Maltese architectural features, built in the early 20th century. Its gardens feature an outdoor swimming pool and a sandy volleyball court. Accommodation includes en suite rooms, self-catering apartments, and dormitory rooms. The common areas are a TV room, the internet café with Wi-Fi access, and a 24-hour reception. Its restaurant offers a mix between local and international dishes. The bar is the perfect spot to relax and have some drinks. Located on the outskirts of St. Julian's main tourist areas, Sprachcaffe Club Village is a short walk from the Mediterranean Sea and from Paceville, Malta’s most popular nightlife centre. The bus station nearby, provides direct connection with Sliema and Valletta.

name: Grand Hotel Gozo
description: Just 400 metres from Mgarr Harbour, the Grand Hotel offers rooftop dining in summer and a pool with uninterrupted views of the island of Malta. This hotel has free WiFi throughout and large rooms with satellite TV. The Hotel’s rooms all offer air conditioning, tea & coffee making facilities and a minibar, and most have country or sea views. A buffet breakfast is provided in the Migiarro restaurant, which serves Mediterranean dishes at dinner. At the Grand Hotel Elemis Spa, you can purchase a variety of treatments, and book sessions at the sauna. Staff can arrange diving excursions, boat trips and other activities. The beaches of Ramla Bay and Hondoq are both 5 km away.

name: Calypso Hotel
description: Overlooking Marsalforn Bay, the Calypso features a rooftop swimming pool with sun deck and cocktail bar. The hotel lies on Gozo, 10 km from the Ferry Terminal with connections to Malta. Rooms at the Calypso are simple in style and come with private balcony and free Wi-Fi connection. Each air conditioned room includes a fully equipped bathroom with bath or shower. Some rooms offer views of the Mediterranean, others face Xaghra Hill. There are 2 restaurants at the hotel, serving a range of Mediterranean, Italian and local cuisine. The Sunset Bar is open all day for cocktails, drinks and snacks. The hotel offers a car rental service, and staff are on hand to advise on excursions and boat trips. The hotel can arrange transport to Mgarr Harbour and to Malta International Airport. For guests with cars, free parking is available nearby.

name: Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort
address: 1, St. Georges Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3390
description: Set in Pembroke, Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort Malta offers a range of superior features, including 6 swimming pools and exclusive access to a secluded beach. It also provides a private dock, a beauty centre and free wireless internet access in all areas. Guests of the hotel can start their day at Pilates Centre, or enjoy the many leisure facilities, such as a diving centre. There is also free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. It also has its very own spa and wellness centre, Apollo Day. There are 249 rooms at Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort Malta, each offering all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. There are also several rooms especially designed for families. Guests of Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort Malta are welcome to sample Asian cuisine at Buddhamann, or try Italian and regional meals at Da Marina. Dining options at the hotel include Cafe24 and White Olive. Other dining options are also available. The area around Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort Malta has a variety of cafés and restaurants. St Julians and Is-Swieqi are just a short drive away.Revato

name: Cavalieri Art Hotel
address: Waterís Edge,Spinola Road,17, St. Julian's STJ 3019
description: The Cavalieri Art Hotel is set on the beach in St Julian’s, and has a seafront terrace and pool. All rooms are air-conditioned and come with free WiFi at this hotel with a great location along Spinola Bay. The hotel's sun deck features parasols, sun loungers, changing rooms and showers. You can use the indoor pool, which is heated between April and November. The Cavalieri serves a buffet breakfast, and Mediterranean and local cuisine for lunch and dinner. The main dining hall overlooks St Julian's Bay. During summer you can dine outdoors, and barbecues are often served on the sun deck. The hotel is 300 metres from the bars and restaurants of lively Paceville. The main bus routes to Valletta and Sliema, and to the Gozo Ferry Terminal, stop nearby. Parking is free subject to availability.

name: Golden Tulip Vivaldi Hotel
address: Dragonara Road, St Julians, Stj 06, St. Julian's
description: Golden Tulip Vivaldi Hotel is set in St Julians centre, 100 metres from the beaches. It offers panoramic views on the Mediterranean Sea and a rooftop pool with sun loungers. Hotel Vivaldi’s rooms are all air conditioned and feature balcony, minibar and satellite TV. Most of them have sea views. Services at Golden Tulip Vivaldi include the Newtones Leisure Club with indoor swimming pool, sauna, hot tub and gym. Parking facilities and Wi-Fi are available. The hotel is in the Paceville district, the main entertainment area of Malta, 300 meters from the Dragonara Casino and 400 meters from St Julian’s bus terminal. Valletta is around a 15-minute drive away. Malta International Airport is reachable in 20 minutes by car.

name: Osborne
description: Set within Valletta's ancient fortifications, the Osborne Hotel features free WiFi throughout and is a 5-minute walk from Malta's St. John’s Cavalier and St. John’s Co-Cathedral. The rooftop swimming pool offers great views. All air conditioned, rooms at Hotel Osborne come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, and tea/coffee making facilities. The bathroom has a hairdryer. The Osborne Hotel features an elegant lounge bar, the Blue Lounge, and a buffet restaurant. Vegetarian and special dietary options are available on request. The hotel is 230 metres from Republic Street, and 500 metres from the Barrakka Lift. The nearest bus stops and ferry port for Sliema are 5 minutes' walk away.

name: Salini Resort
description: Set on a gentle slope overlooking the Salina Bay and the Mediterranean Sea, the 4-star Salini Resort offers 2 outdoor pools. The spacious and stylish rooms come with either sea or countryside views. All rooms and suites are air conditioned and include a balcony or terrace. The en-suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Other facilities at the Salini include 1 tennis court, 1 padel court and a wellness area with an indoor pool and fitness facilities. A restaurant and bar, as well as large lounge and dining areas are also at guests' disposal. The property features meeting rooms and a spacious hall which can accommodate 1000 guests. The town of Bugibba is 3.5 km away, while St. Paul's Bay is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Maritim Antonine Hotel & Spa Malta
address: George Borg Olivier Street, Mellieha MLH 1021
description: Offering a rooftop pool, a spa, and 3 restaurants, Maritim Antonine Hotel & Spa is set in the hillside village of Mellieha, 1 km from Malta’s largest beach. It boasts panoramic sea and country views. It is just 25 km from Malta International Airport. Maritim Antonine Hotel & Spa includes 3 pools, one of which is a heated indoor pool, and a sauna. There is also a modern gym and numerous state-of-the-art treatments available. Wi-Fi throughout is free. All spacious, elegant and air conditioned, the rooms come with satellite TV and free coffee-making facilities. Some overlook the sea, garden, or city. Guests can enjoy a variety of cuisines at the on-site restaurants, which offer both indoor and outdoor dining spaces. In summer months, pool-side BBQs are also arranged. Situated in the north of the island, the property is a 30-minute drive from the capital Valletta.

name: Hotel Viu57
address: 27 Triq Dun Belin Azzopardi, Mellieha MLH 1220
description: Hotel VIU57 features an outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Mellieħa. With a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Hotel VIU57 offers certain rooms with city views, and all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation each room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near Hotel VIU57 include Mellieha Bay Beach, Ghadira Bay Beach and Santa Maria Estate Beach. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Soreda Hotel
description: Featuring free WiFi, Soreda Hotel is located in Qawra, with Bugibba on one side and the village of St.Paul's Bay on the other. It offers 2 outdoor swimming pools and an indoor pool with hydromassage. The on-site Express Fitness Club is complete with gym and sauna. Rooms are spacious and air-conditioned, with a balcony and a private bathroom with hairdryer. All come with satellite TV, a minibar and a kettle. Evening entertainment is available daily, with live local performers. The hotel also includes a lounge bar with a wide-screen TV for major international sporting events. A small games room with 2 pool tables is also available. The Soreda's restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Breakfast and dinner are buffet style. During summer you can enjoy drinks and snacks on the rooftop terrace with panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea. Free garage parking is provided, and Malta International Airport is 30 minutes' drive away.

name: Park Lane Boutique Aparthotel
description: Park Lane Aparthotel is located on the Qawra peninsula with views of St.Paul’s Bay. It has a rooftop pool and terrace with panoramic views of the Mediterranean and offers free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned accommodation. The studios and apartments include a kitchenette, a private bathroom and satellite TV. Rooms also come with tea/coffee making facilities and a small fridge. A continental breakfast, including a cooked-to-order breakfast, is served daily. The Park Lane also has a bar serving drinks throughout the day. These can be enjoyed on the furnished patio. Guests can relax in the lobby where there is a wide-screen TV. Staff can provide information and assistance on booking tours and trips throughout the island. The property is directly opposite Bugibba Bus Station. A shuttle service to/from Luqa Airport can be arranged on request.

name: The Coleridge Boutique Hotel In Valletta
description: Situated within a 7-minute walk of Upper Barrakka Gardens, The Coleridge features rooms in Valletta. Located around 70 metres from Manoel Theatre, the hotel with free WiFi is also 400 metres away from Casa Rocca Piccola. The property is 400 metres from National Museum of Archaeology and a 5-minute walk from National War Museum. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Rooms include a private bathroom and free toiletries, and selected rooms here will provide you with a terrace. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property. Museum in Valletta Malta is 500 metres from The Coleridge. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 6 km from the property.

name: Happy and Healthy Gozo B&B
address: 42 Triq L-Isptar San Giljan Gozo, Victoria FNT 9013
description: Situated in Victoria, 2.2 km from Xlendi Beach, Happy and Healthy Gozo B&B offers accommodation with free WiFi, a terrace or a balcony and access to a garden and a year-round outdoor pool. Each unit features a toaster, fridge, a coffee machine, as well as a minibar and kettle. Some of the units have a cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes à la carte, continental and Full English/Irish options. At the bed and breakfast you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Guests at Happy and Healthy Gozo B&B can enjoy table tennis on site, or cycling in the surroundings. Cittadella is 1.1 km from the accommodation, while Ta' Pinu Basilica is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Malta International, 39 km from Happy and Healthy Gozo B&B, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
